snippet: The party for the Nets’ home opener at the Barclays Center did not unfurl as many had hoped as New York still contends with the lingering effects of Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Celebration of Brooklyn Nets home opener at the Barclays Center is tempered by effects of Hurricane Sandy, but many fans appear grateful for the distraction.
lead_paragraph: The party for the Nets’ home opener at the Barclays Center did not unfurl as many had hoped as New York still contends with the lingering effects of Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: Nets’ Opening Day Arrives, but Few Feel Like Celebrating
headline.main: For Fans, Debut Is More of an Escape Than a Celebration
headline.print_headline: For Fans, Debut Is More of an Escape Than a Celebration
